text: Alan Tacher (born March 28, 1968 in Mexico City) is a Mexican television presenter. He is part of the main cast of Univision's morning program Despierta América. ==Television== *Califa de Oro (1995) *Te caché (1998) *Tempranito (1998) *La Academia (2000) *Aplauso Aplauso (2004) *Levántate (2008) *Décadas (2010) *Hoy (2011-2012) *Despierta América (2012–present) == Other websites == * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican television presenters Category:People from Mexico City
title: Alan Tacher
